name: Hotel Can Quetglas
address: Carrer de Santa Rita 13, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, 2.7 km from Calo des Grells Beach, Hotel Can Quetglas provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hotel Can Quetglas features certain rooms with pool views, and rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Can Quetglas. Palma Yacht Club is 2.5 km from the hotel, while Palma Port is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 10 km from Hotel Can Quetglas.

name: Círculo Gran Vía, Autograph Collection (Adults Only)
description: The history of Madrid remains throughout the corridors and rooms of Hotel Círculo Gran Via. Occupying the former home of The Circle of Trade and Industrial Union of Madrid, our historic building was inaugurated un 1924 and recently renovated to become an Adults Only 18 plus hotel in the heart of the city. Because of it’s excellent location, Hotel Círculo Gran Vía offers the perfect accommodation for discovering the city’s main attractions, such as Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol and the Royal Palace. The main airport, Adolfo Suárez, is located only 17 km away. Offering 71 fully equipped rooms which combine tradition and design to ensure your utmost comfort, as well as a fitness room, meeting rooms and complimentary wifi throughout the hotel. Here, both business and leisure travelers will find everything they need to create a memorable experience. Relive the history and discover the city at Hotel Círculo Gran Vía.Marriott

name: Hostal Las Fuentes
description: Hostal Las Fuentes is located in the centre of Madrid, just 5 minutes from the Puerta del Sol. It offers great-value accommodation, with free WiFi access. Bedrooms at the guest house are simple and comfortable. All rooms have en suite bathroom and TV. Dry cleaning, laundry an ironing services are available for an extra charge. A safe is also available for a supplement. Hostal Las Fuentes is located near a public parking available for a surcharge. Hostal Las Fuentes is a great base for visiting the city’s attractions. It is just 150 metres from Plaza Mayor, and 300 metres from the Royal Palace. There are also excellent public transport links nearby, from Opera metro station.

name: M Pods Malaga
description: Set in Málaga, 600 metres from San Andres Beach, M Pods Malaga provides air-conditioned rooms and a shared lounge. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.7 km from Port of Malaga, 1.8 km from Malaga Cathedral and 2 km from Malaga Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. At the capsule hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near M Pods Malaga include Misericordia Beach, Malaga María Zambrano Train Station and Automobile and Fashion Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: H10 Gran Tinerfe
address: Av. Rafael Puig Lluvina 13, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Gran Tinerfe is situated on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts. Guests also have exclusive access to the casino and Bar Discoteca Teide nightclub. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Guests can take advantage of the recreational activities available, such as an outdoor pool, billiards and a sauna. H10 Gran Tinerfe is an adults-only hotel. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They also offer a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. Guests of H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel can sit down to a satisfying breakfast daily at Asensen Food & Experience, plus dinner at Los Menceyes after a day of sightseeing. Places to dine at the hotel include Mike's Coffee and El Mirador Brasserie. There is also a variety of beverages to choose from at the outdoor bar, which offers a view of the beach. There are a range of cafés and restaurants close to H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel Tenerife, and Adeje and Costa Adeje are a brief drive away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Playa de las Americas.Revato

name: Sun Riviera
description: Sun Riviera is located in central Cannes, a few minutes’ walk from Boulevard de la Croisette. It offers an outdoor terrace and a Mediterranean garden. The train station is a 10-minute walk away. Guest rooms at this 4-star hotel are air-conditioned and soundproofed. Each has a marble private bathroom, flat-screen satellite TV and Wi-Fi internet access. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar at hotel Sun Riviera. The hotel is situated a short walk from the Palais de Festivals, the Convention Centres and the many shops and restaurants on La Croisette. A private garage is available on site.

name: Pauli Hostel
description: Conveniently located in Hamburg’s Old Town and just 20 metres from Königstrasse S-bahn Station, Pauli Hostel offers free Wi-Fi access and free tea. The dormitory rooms here are bright and traditionally decorated with wooden bunk beds. There is a shared kitchen and 2 bathrooms, and private lockers are available. Guests are welcome to prepare home-made meals and snacks in the fully equipped, shared kitchen. A supermarket is located 300 metres away, and a variety of restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk, or the city's main shopping street is a 7-minute ride away via U-Bahn. Hamburg’s famous Reeperbahn Street is 1 km from Pauli Hostel, and the main shopping street Mönckebergstraße can be reached in 7 minutes by public transport. Hamburg's port and fish market are just a 5-minute walk away. Hamburg Central Station is located 4.2 km from the property and the A1 motorway is 10 minutes by car.

name: Corfu Mare Hotel -Adults only
description: The adults-only Corfu Mare is a newly renovated boutique hotel, ideally situated in a quiet area just 2.5 km from Corfu Town. With views over the Ionian Sea, it features a pool and hot tub with fresh water. Refreshments and light meals are available to enjoy on the pool deck. To stimulate the guests senses, rooms are decorated according to themes with trendy and unusual wallpapers, colours and furniture. There are 2 rooms for guests with mobility issues. Guests can make use of the well equipped gym. The private parking area and the strategic location near the centre of Corfu Town make the Corfu Mare Hotel -Adults only the ultimate relaxation destination.

name: The Mandrake
description: The Mandrake is a multi-award-winning, luxury lifestyle property in the heart of Londons Fitzrovia. Every aspect of The Mandrake has been thoughtfully curated and designed to offer guests a unique, immersive and truly unforgettable experience. With the culture and nightlife of Soho and the West End on our doorstep, and the shopping of Oxford Street only a stones throw away, The Mandrake is a perfect base to set off and explore all that London has to offer. Our 33 luxurious bedrooms include three opulent suites and an award-winning Penthouse. All bedrooms have been designed to cocoon and comfort with a provocative use of colour, texture and original works of art. Transporting you far from the streets of Fitzrovia, our destination bars, Waeska and Jurema, offer ethnobotanical cocktails unlike any others found in the city. Whilst our restaurant, YOPO, led by Executive Chef George Scott-Toft, is a South American inspired feast of culture and cuisine. The Mandrakes renowned fusion of art, culture and design, brings a varied curation of artists, performers, exhibitions and events through our doors; turning the hotel into an ever-changing backdrop for new talent to shine.iHotelier/iStay

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Enschede
description: Situated 1.7 km from Holland Casino Enschede in Enschede, Van der Valk Hotel Enschede features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers a swimming pool, sport- and wellness facilities. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. Each room comes with a private bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. A terrace is featured. The hotel also offers bike hire. Naturemuseum Enschede is 1.9 km from Van der Valk hotel Enschede, while Rijksmuseum Twente is 2.7 km from the property.

name: Breathless Cancun Soul Resort And Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 4.5, Num Ext.: Mz 34, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Nestled between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupte Lagoon, Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa offers vibrant, contemporary décor and is located along the Cancun strip in the Hotel Zone. This beachfront resort will feature 429 suites, including the xhale club and the Unlimited-Luxury® vacation concept with a variety of luxurious amenities and services. Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa also features the standard CleanComplete Verification™ protocols on property. This 360-degree quality, safety and hygiene program takes into account every aspect of the on-property experience, backed by the highly-respected third-party certificationWebBeds

name: Hideaway at Royalton Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort, Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Reignite meaningful connections at an adults-only aged 18+ resort where elevated experiences create memories to last a lifetime. Located only 15 minutes from Cancun International Airport, your every desire is tailor-made. From exclusive dining to private beach and pool access and luxury accommodations, our resort-within-a-resort offers a premium Riviera Cancun getaway that also affords you access to all our neighboring Royalton Riviera Cancun has to offer.Marriott

name: Melbourne Central Yha
description: Boasting a rooftop terrace with BBQ facilities and amazing views of the CBD, Melbourne Central Hostel is situated within the Free Tram Zone. Guests enjoy a 24/7 reception desk and a large ground floor communal area with a shared kitchen, a TV area, a book exchange, a café/bar and free WiFi in public areas. Southern Cross Station and the Skybus Terminal are only a 6-minute walk away. Guests can take in the sights at Federation Square, explore Melbourne’s famous laneways or visit a trendy bar. All rooms include bunk beds, individual reading lights, electronic door locks and access to shared bathroom facilities. The dormitory rooms feature secure luggage lockers and there are private rooms available. The free City Circle Tram and a $5 Melbourne Tourist Shuttle Bus stop directly outside and visits iconic Melbourne sites such as the MCG, the Shrine of Remembrance and Rod Laver Arena. A range of activities are available, including movie nights, walking tours, pub crawls and table tennis are available.

name: Hilton Aventura Miami
description: Our beautiful AAA 4-Diamond hotel is conveniently located across from Aventura Mall and a short drive away from Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood and Miami International Airports, Hard Rock Stadium, Gulfstream Park, Aventura Hospital, and Sunny Isles Beach. A complimentary shuttle is available within a five-mile radius. Indulge in culinary delights at Gala, offering South American-inspired cuisine, and enjoy specially crafted cocktails at MuseBar. We offer two amenity decks and poolside cabanas. Shuttle Service to Aventura Mall, Gulfstream Park, and Sunny Isles Beach is now available from 10:00 am - 6:30 pm daily. Hilton Aventura Miami is the ideal setting for work or play.Hilton

name: Barrio Latino Hotel Riviera Maya
address: Calle 4 Entre Avenida 10 y 15, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This Playa del Carmen hotel is in the Old Town city centre. The hotel features free Wifi throughout the property and provide reception services all day and all night long since 1997. The hotel features a large tropical garden and warm, adobe-style decor. The hotel provides guests with information on original local experiences, food and tours and can help arrange also car, bike and kite surfing rentals. All rooms at the Barrio Latino al Centro by Pueblo Magico Network face the garden and are equipped with ceiling fans, fridges and hammocks. Each has a private bathroom, a hairdryer, a safety-deposit box and air conditioning. The Barrio Latino al Centro by Pueblo Magico Network is only 180 metres from the popular Fifth Avenue. Limited parking (fee will be charged) is also provided at this hotel. The hotel offer an EV charging point.

name: Ocean Zen Suites on 5th Avenue - Adults Only
address: Quinta Avenida (5a) Calle 68 y 70, 77728 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Ocean Zen Suites - Eco Luxury Hotel Suites with amazing roof top infinity pool with views of the Turquoise blue waters of the Mexican Caribbean over lush green trees. Punta Esmeralda, Clean powdery sandy quiet beaches and turquoise waters are less than 400 meters away or less than 5 minutes stroll. Yes, we are located on peaceful and quiet famous NEW Quinta (5th Avenue), away from the Noisy bars. Neighborhood local restaurants, Fruit/Vegetable market and 24-Hour store are less than 5 minutes’ walk. Relax on the roof top terrace infinity pool area, watching the amazing sunrise or lay in the sunbeds at night gazing at the moon and stars and feeling the cool breeze. We are an Eco-Friendly Boutique hotel, AC units at Ocean Zen suites are Solar powered. Hot water tanks are European design with hot water on demand. FREE- Harvested and Purified RAIN WATER supplied to OCEAN ZEN SUITES by RAIN-HA, tested by Mexican Government Authority Labs. Please bring your own bottle (BYOB) for FREE Refills of Pure Rain water. No acid rain, No chemicals. Modern bathroom with, water saving showers and toilets. Shampoo, Body wash, Conditioner and hand soap are all naturally made from pure honey by Mayans from Mayans Village. Each of Suite has FREE Premium Internet, with direct connect and your own FREE WIFI allocated to that Suite. FREE WIFI by the Infinity pool and all common area. Our Eco- Luxury Suites are ergonomically designed for your comfort. Combination decor and atmosphere with modern Eco technology. All beds, patio and pool furniture are hand made by Mayans with local solid hard wood. Come stay with us experience Ocean Zen Suits -where Eco Luxury meets Serenity.

name: Secrets Bahia Mita Surf and Spa
address: Av Carretera Cruz De Huanacaxtle – Punta De Mita 5, 63762 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Secrets Bahia Mita Surf & SPA perfectly located in the exclusive area of Bahia de Banderas near Punta Mita, and Marina Cruz de Huanacaxtle on the golden sand beaches of the Banderas Bay, fuses elegant and original design by Sordo Madaleno with nature elements, just minutes from the famous Marina de Cruz de Huanacaxtle. This adults-only getaway offers Unlimited-Luxury® privileges, including limitless gourmet dining and top-shelf spirits, daily activities, live entertainment, and Unlimited Connectivity – offering free Wi-Fi and free calling to the U.S. and Canada. Guests even have the privilege to visit nearby participating resorts with the Sip, Savor & See Dining Experience. All 278 spacious suites offer remarkable tropical views, partial ocean views & ocean views, modern décor and refined luxury amenities including daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Relax at the world-class Secrets Spa by Pevonia® Additionally, all guests have free flow access to nine restaurants, seven bars, two snacks and one coffee shop, and facilities at nearby Dreams Bahia de Mita. Do it all or do nothing at all at this romantic exclusive hideaway. Secrets Bahia Mita – Romantic. Refined. Remarkable.FarePortal

name: Hotel Mio Vallarta Unique and Different - Adults Only
address: Blvd Francisco Medina Ascencio 2179, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Hotel MIO is the place where good taste and comfort come together; The warmth and quality you need go hand in hand so you can work and relax, while enjoying each area designed especially for you. Experience a unique feeling, where we combine the best of two worlds to offer you a personalized service, full of emotions and sensations that will make your stay unbeatable. Our goal is to provide an exceptional and exclusive service, whether your visit is for a single night or an extended stay, at every moment you will feel the experience of a Business with Warmth. ADULTS ONLY HOTEL.iHotelier/iStay

name: Seaview Hotel - Adults Only 16 Plus
description: With panoramic views of St. Paul's Islands, this modern hotel offers two swimming pools, a sun terrace, a gym, a rooftop bar and a restaurant. The property is located within a 5-minute walk of Bugibba Perched Beach and offers convenient access to the other rocky and sandy beaches in the area. With air conditioning and free WiFi, rooms at the Sea View feature a furnished balcony. They all come with tea/coffee making facilities, a minibar, a safe and a satellite TV. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available daily and includes cooked dishes. The restaurant serves both Maltese and English specialities. Diving, fishing and horse riding excursions can be booked at reception. Boats to the nearby islands leave from Plajja Tal'Bognor, a few minutes' walk away. The property is a 5-minute walk from Bugibba centre. Shops, restaurants and clubs are within 500 metres of the Seaview Hotel - Adults Only 16 Plus.

name: Ivy Hotel - Adults Only
address: Triq Francis Zammit, Stj 3221 St Julian's, St. Julian's STJ 3210
description: Featuring a bar, Ivy Hotel - Adults Only is located in the centre of St Julian's, 600 metres from St George's Bay Beach. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ivy Hotel - Adults Only every room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Balluta Bay Beach, Exiles Beach and Portomaso Marina. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from Ivy Hotel - Adults Only.

name: The Londoner Hotel St. Julian's
address: 138 Saint George's Road, St. Julian's STJ 3022
description: Ideally located in the centre of St Julian's, The Londoner Hotel St. Julian's offers free WiFi throughout the property, a shared lounge and free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room includes a kettle, while some rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature city views. At The Londoner Hotel St. Julian's the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near The Londoner Hotel St. Julian's include St George's Bay Beach, Balluta Bay Beach and Portomaso Marina. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: The Views Baia - Adults Only
description: Featuring views of Funchal Bay, The Views Baia - Adults Only Hotel offers modern accommodation. Facilities include the Four Feelings Spa, 2 swimming pools, and a well-equipped gym. Rooms at the Four Views open onto private balconies overlooking the Atlantic Ocean or the mountains. All rooms have bathrooms with walk-in showers, and some rooms have cooking facilities or a private spa bath. A varied menu of Mediterranean, international and vegetarian dishes is served at the Bay View Restaurant. Guests can enjoy drinks and cocktails accompanied by live music at the Woogie Boogie Bar. A hot tub, massage treatments and indoor and outdoor swimming pools are available. The Hotel The Views Baia - Adults Only is located uphill from São João Fortress. It is 30 minutes’ drive from Madeira Airport and on-site private parking is free.
